name: Snowflake
description: Snowflake powers the data cloud. It is a solution for all things data: warehousing, lakes, engineering, science, application development and sharing. It allows organizations to unite their siloed data, easily discover and securely share governed data, and execute diverse analytic workloads.
why_partnered: Snowflake was creating the data warehouse of the future: one built for the cloud and optimized for cloud workloads. The companyâ€™s vision, paired with the technical excellence of the team and user-centric design made it clear that they were going to become a category-defining business with the power to endure.
